summary.para: Represents a mapping between a C data type and an XML element.
The local name of the XML element.
The namespace of the XML element.
The type that corresponds to this XML element.
Not all types support being read and written as an element. If the documentation for the indicates it supports , then it can be used with this structure.
Additional information about the type. Each type has a different description structure. This may be NULL, depending on the .
